name: MathCalculator
description: A high-precision calculator that evaluates a given mathematical expression string and returns its numerical result. It can handle complex arithmetic, parentheses, exponentiation, and common mathematical functions (e.g., sin, cos, log, pi).

input_parameters.name: expression
input_parameters.description: The mathematical expression string to be calculated. e.g., "(10 + 5^2) / sin(pi/2)"

expected_output: Returns the final numerical result of the calculation as a string or float. If the expression is invalid or calculation fails (e.g., division by zero, syntax error), returns a clear error message string.
